medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Abdominal pain started in the left lower quadrant 8 days ago, initially with fevers and chills, which later migrated to the right side. Fever and chills resolved; abdominal pain has improved considerably but continues. The patient also experienced decreased appetite, mild diarrhea, but no nausea or vomiting. Symptoms do not change with eating or bowel movements.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Chronic renal failure (CRF), Hypertension (HTN), Right eye macular degeneration, Hypothyroidism, Gout.
